初遇.encontent:
Hello, I think we have been acquainted. ... I am responsible
 for your teeth, every night you fall asleep.
初遇.content:
你好，我想我们并不陌生。……我负责照看人们的牙齿，在
每一个熟睡的夜晚。

箱中气候.encontent:
The soil has become crumbly, areated, suitable for
 plantation, and conducive for the dry body to regenerate.
箱中气候.content: 泥土变得松软，适宜种植，帮助干瘪的躯体重获新生。

致未来.encontent:
Heading towards the future means growing up, means
 teeth falling ... and into new life.
致未来.content: 走向未来预示着成长，预示着牙齿的脱落……与新生。

孑立.encontent:
Everyone here gnashes their teeth and covers their
 mouth with their hands. Come on, today is not a revenge
 day.
孑立.content:
这儿的每一个人都紧紧咬着牙，以手掌掩嘴。今天不是复
仇的日子。

问候.encontent:
Stop talking. It's time for a check-up ... Please open
 your mouth.
问候.content: 无需赘言，例行检查——请先张开你的嘴巴。

朝晨.encontent:
Toothpaste or tooth powder will make your teeth glowing
 and healthy. Mint makes your teeth courageous, fearless
 and never escape from the gum.
朝晨.content:
用牙膏或洁牙粉打磨牙齿会让它们更光亮，也更健康。薄
荷将为你的牙齿带来恒久的勇气，让它们不感畏惧，不从
牙床上逃离。

信任-朝晨.encontent: Harvest last night brings a big breakfast delight.
信任-朝晨.content: 昨晚收获颇丰，这将是一个美味的早晨。

夜暮.encontent:
Kids in early childhood are hyperactive at night. They are energetic
 and have mood swings ... Their demand for bedtime stories is
 a bottomless pit. So I always prepare songs for them.
夜暮.content:
成长期的孩子们夜中时常躁动不安，他们活泼好动，情绪
多变……面对睡前故事，便像是吃不饱的怪物，然后，我
会为他们唱歌。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Please, have a sweet dream. "Mary had a little lamb,
 little lamb, little lamb ..."
信任-夜暮.content: 你安然入睡便可。“玛丽有只小绵羊，小绵羊，小绵羊……”

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
I have seen those tooth fairies flying in the air with their
 hair dancing freely. Inside their gold-string pockets lie the
 fragile baby teeth collected from the kids.
帽檐与发鬓.content:
我看见牙仙们上下翻飞，它们须发扑朔，金丝口袋里装着
孩子们纤弱的乳牙。

袖与手.encontent:
You need to act swiftly and gently, firmly and precisely to grab
 hold of their neck, wings or the back. Don't hurt their abdomen
 and ankles. Like this ...
袖与手.content:
动作要又轻又快、稳定而准确，掐住脖子、翅膀或是背脊
，留意避开腹部或脚踝。像是这样……

衣着与身形.encontent:
The color is flexible. My black overcoat helps expose
 every single pathogenic tooth.
衣着与身形.content:
不必拘泥于颜色，黑大褂能让每一颗致病的牙齿无处躲藏
。

嗜好.encontent:
If you have any clue about dispelling the effect of
 the "shrink and imprison" incantation, please tell
 me ... No, not for me, I have a friend who ...
嗜好.content:
如果你有任何关于“解除缩小禁锢”的咒语，都可以分享
给我……不，不是我，是我的一个朋友他……

赞赏.encontent: Well done. Here is a toffee for you.
赞赏.content: 做得很好。我会奖励你一颗太妃糖。

亲昵.encontent: Your baby teeth. Twelve in total. They're all here.
亲昵.content: 这是你的乳牙，整整二十颗，都在这里。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
My family and I have mediated between humans and arcanists. We
 gain possessions, status and a decent life. But at the same
 time, we lose friends, belongingness and recognition by society.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
我与我的家庭在人类与神秘学家之间行走，我们获得钱财
、地位与优渥的生活，但与此同时也失去朋友、归所与社
会的认可。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
I remember you, Ms. Vertin. When you were still a student, when
 I was the dentist there, you always visited the clinic. All
 those headaches you had were faked, but the wounds and bruises
 were real. I think your frequent visits were for the comforting
 candies, weren't they? Because you always smiled when you received
 the toffees.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
我记得你，维尔汀小姐。当你还在学校时，当我还在学校
时，你总是校医室的常客。一半头疼脑热是装的，另一半
擦伤和摔伤是真的。我猜想你是为了安慰糖果来的，因为
当你拿到太妃糖罐时，总是笑着的。

独白.encontent:
When in human society, do as the humans do; when in the arcanist
 community, do as the arcanists do. "Too attached to your identity"
 always causes arrogance, and consequentially brings destruction.
独白.content:
当你在人类之间，便以人类的方式生活。当你在神秘学家
之中，又当以神秘学家的方式生活。“保持自我”总是滋
养傲慢之心，紧接着带来毁灭。
